channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @Shmarya @naftalibennett Killing journalists hasn’t hurt the Israeli-Saudi-Kushner alliance so I don’t see the problem.

I suspect that this sort of last-ditch maneuvers are prescribed by the classic 1841 guide to running a crypto operation, which I have not actually read but have learned some lessons from. https://t.co/h9vBNmcgaa https://t.co/pB40CgB2Tn
This whole thing has me thinking a great deal about wisdom and intergenerational knowledge transfer.

@whstancil I suspect that this sort of last-ditch maneuvers are prescribed by the classic 1841 guide to running a crypto operation, which I have not actually read but have learned some lessons from. https://t.co/h9vBNmcgaa
@TheLincoln I like my pundits to do the work of examining, and perhaps questioning, their inarticulate feelings.

@rmneiss @TwitterSafety Because they’re not trying very hard. Because under US rules of corporate governance, they owe their shareholders the duty of spending as little on moderation as they can get away with without costing them users, advertisers, or other metrics that add to shareholder value.
Chicago peeps: make this a szold out performance! https://t.co/hJOeJGkoMX
“Don’t follow leaders” is one of those lines from Pirkei Avot whose wisdom proves itself again and again. @peterhimmelman
@trekonomics @ZemmourEric So what is Eric’s current and future role, having not made it to the 2022 presidential finals?
@benclaywolf How does one access this?

Great job, Biden and Schumer, and your strategy of not raising a ruckus. Here’s the thing: When you are determined not to fight with Nazis… or to provoke Nazis lest that lead to a fight… congratulations, you’re a Nazi! https://t.co/qhrOUGtckO
@froomkin When you are determined not to fight with Nazis… or to provoke Nazis lest that lead to a fight… congratulations, you’re a Nazi!
@froomkin Nah, they would do it for NYPD cops too.
And the Israeli police riot at Shireen Abu Aqleh’s funeral has brought her killing into the Bob Dylan portion of my Twitter stream. Excellent work, folks.
@typolad Seems like it should be Saurian Brandy.
@rmneiss What if the ADL exchange programs have made the Israeli police more line their American counterparts — that is, an extractive, oppressive force designed to oppress certain minorities?
@KurtBusiek Deep in the bayou, illegally sharing mp3s, lurked the Swampster….
@Apikoros613 @Elishabenabuya Isn’t that cognate with gazer, which means both carrot and to cut?
@EladNehorai “I can’t articulate why” — seems like it might be time for some self analysis rather than just going with the flow….
@trekonomics Thesis: Woody Allen’s invocation of Marshall McLuhan was the most accurate prediction of any science fiction movie of that era.

@trekonomics @JohnArgh I figured it peaked when my kid wanted a small mining rig for his bar mitzvah. If kids are into it….
@trekonomics @JohnArgh Remind me not to underestimate my kid. That was in 2013. And this year’s Super Bowl ads were a clear sell signal so I might have gotten out in time.
@datadivajf I’m hoping they’re planning to bring in Sulu and perhaps some others — are there others ?— in year two or three.
@datadivajf Did someone ask for a someone flat song featuring Gregory Peck in the first verse? https://t.co/u11JUuw8Hu
I guess if they had to name a crypto coin after one of my pets, I’m glad they chose my current cat, not my childhood gerbil named Rashi. https://t.co/QwUDETj3iJ
@trekonomics The fact this happened in 2022 and not 2023 is the most hopeful thing I’ve seen all year.
